text: Di madagoaa taane mo dono lodo hege mo tangada hai hegau ga daamada e hula labelaa, tamana di ahina ga helekai, “Mmada, ma hoohoo ga hiahi dolomeenei, goodou e humalia hua e noho boo nei. Hoohoo hua ge di maa ga bouli, noho i kinei e tenetene. Daiaa goodou ga aala aga limalima gaa hula gi di godou guongo.”
